The point was how else would they know that the Great Wars haven't 
even happened yet.  Oh well I guess that's insignificant.  Moving 
right along (and not getting banned for argueing).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry, but this capsule has been in space for a REALLY long 
> time... that's all... no time-shifting...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Mustex and Stallex arrive.
> > 
> > Mustex: Real smooth Mustex.  A bots in trouble and you leave the

> wires 
> > together.
> > 
> > Mustex:  Stallex this is an Autobot capsule. We've gone back in 
> time.
> > 
> > Mustex desperately trys to get the life support systems back up.  
He

DNA 
> > scanners implanted (remember all bots have them built in since 
> "Beast

peice

is
